title: The life, and raigne of King Edward the Sixt Written by Sr. Iohn Hayward Kt. Dr. of Lawe.
author: Hayward, John, Sir, 1564?-1627.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed [by Eliot's Court Press, and J. Lichfield at Oxford?] for Iohn Partridge, and are to be sold at the signe of the Sunne in Paules Churchyard,
